title: Rewired for Advanced Communication, Executive Business Center
posting_body: Luxury Apartments for Rent in Redmond, WA
The Onyx Apartments in Redmond, WA offer the luxury living you want with attractive amenities for every season and interest.

With newly renovated interiors in each apartment home and incredible features in our community, you are sure to find the perfect space for your family in one of our apartments for rent in Redmond, WA.

Staying in one of our apartments in Redmond grants you access to recreational activities, whether you choose to head to local bike trails right outside your community at Marymoor Park, or take advantage of our fitness facility.
Make the right choice by choosing to stay in one of our apartments for rent in Redmond, WA.
We invite you to join us at The Onyx apartments.
Conveniently located just minutes from downtown Seattle and Bellevue, you can enjoy an easy walk to the best of local shopping and dining.
Welcome home to The Onyx Apartments in Redmond, WA!
Call today for information about current availability.

This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 840 Sq.
- Gourmet Ktichen with Double Stainless Steel Sinks

We welcome pets of all shapes and sizes with no weight limit.
$500 deposit is required per pet and $35 monthly pet rent per pet.
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
